resources.string: Android is not an open source operating system
Android was originally created on top of Linux Kernel 2.6
ANR will occur when application is not responding
You can not use Log.d method to generate log messages
You can not modify an XML file
Android version number 11 will be released in 2019
Android was founded by Rich Miner, Nick Sears, Chris White and Andy Rubin
Currently, Android is owned by Apple Inc.
Corona, C#, PhoneGap, BASIC or C/C++ can not be used in Android development
Gradle is a JVM-based (Java Virtual Machine) build system
